source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_SEQ_00<tab>Sul Oul is eager to hear what Granson has to say.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_SEQ_00<tab>プラ・エンニ茸窟のスール＝オールは、グランソンが出した答えを聞きたいようだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_SEQ_01<tab>Having taken ample time to consider the nature of the man Branden was, and the man Granson had convinced himself he must be, the hunter has at last accepted the simple truth: that a hardened heart full of hate is ultimately empty. There is naught to be gained from playing the part of a vengeful hero, for there are only victims in his story. And so he must bring an end to the tale and lay Milinda and Branden's spirits to rest...and then move on. Satisfied that Granson has at last turned away from the brink, Sul Oul reveals the location of the Claws of Orthus, and furnishes you with a satchel of powder to dispel the glamour that shields it from view.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_SEQ_01<tab>スール＝オールと話した。グランソンは、ディカイオシュネーへの復讐とブランデンの救済、そのどちらもやり遂げようと決意したようだ。イル・メグのティム・グースにある<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EAB5C01 /var>に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8E8901 /var>」を使い、双頭狼の爪を探そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_SEQ_02<tab>After coming to the designated location in Timh Gyeus, you cast the powder into the air with a flourish, which settles to reveal the hidden coffer. Granson kneels and withdraws the Claws of Orthus, and as if on cue, Dikaiosyne appears to claim his prize, and the battle is joined.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_SEQ_02<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61EAB5C01 /var>に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8E8901 /var>を使い、双頭狼の爪を発見すると、指輪の存在を嗅ぎつけたディカイオシュネーが現れた。グランソンと力を合わせてディカイオシュネーを倒そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_SEQ_03<tab>Though your enemy is formidable indeed, together you and Granson manage to lay the fallen Warrior of Light low. As he begins to fade into motes of aether, Branden seems to regain a fragment of his lost self, as he reflects on perhaps the most painful decision of his life. To your surprise, however, you learn that like Granson, he managed to reject the mistaken belief that he need forsake compassion and love to move on, and instead chose to embrace it, that he might honor the memory of the lady Sauldia.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_SEQ_03<tab>冒険者とグランソンは、共闘してディカイオシュネーを打ち破った。罪喰いが消失したことで、依代にしていたブランデンの肉体から魂の残滓が解き放たれ、ソールディアを失った後の想いを口にする。歪んだ正義を妄信して己を責め続けたブランデンは、最期の時には、自身の過ちに気づくことができたようだ。プラ・エンニ茸窟の「スール＝オール」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_SEQ_04<tab>Sul Oul is relieved to hear that Branden's soul is at peace...and that the turmoil in Granson's heart has subsided as well. With the deed done, the hunter has no need for the royal relics of Voeburt, and so he entrusts them to the former retainer that they may be enshrined in the fallen kingdom forevermore.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_SEQ_04<tab>スール＝オールと話した。ブランデンが守ろうとしたフッブート王国の三国宝は、このイル・メグの地で、スール＝オールが守り続けていくようだ。クリスタリウムの彷徨う階段亭にいる「グランソン」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_SEQ_05<tab>Having returned to the Crystarium, his hunt at an end, Granson turns his thoughts to the future, and realizes that he no longer feels at home there or in Wright or anywhere else. The road shall host him for the time being, as he believes that someone, somewhere must surely be in need of a reliable sword hand. Though your time together is at an end, there is no reason to think you will not meet again, and so you bid farewell to each other...until the next hunt.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_SEQ_05<tab>グランソンと話した。復讐を終え、生きる意味を失ったグランソンは、助けを必要としている人たちのために、戦い続けていくようだ。それが、彼を愛したミリンダと、彼と同じ悲しみを背負ったブランデンのためであると信じて。

target: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_TODO_00<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61EAB5C01 /var>に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8E8901 /var>を使う

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_TODO_01<tab>Use the mushroom powder to reveal the hidden coffer.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_TODO_01<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61EAB5C01 /var>に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8E8901 /var>を使う

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Sul Oul at Pla Enni.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_TODO_02<tab>プラ・エンニ茸窟のスール＝オールと話す

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Granson in the Crystarium.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_TODO_03<tab>彷徨う階段亭のグランソンと話す

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_SULOUL_000_001<tab>Granson. I have given you ample time to consider the path that has brought you here...and where it invariably leads all who walk it.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_SULOUL_000_001時間は与えた。
おぬしがたどり着いた答えを聞かせてもらおう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_002<tab>...I didn't know what to do after I lost Milinda. How to mourn her or how to live. I felt...that if I put it all on Dikaiosyne, put my everything into the hunt, that at least I wouldn't have to think about myself, or what comes next.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_002ブランデンは、大切な人を救えなかった怒りで、心を殺した。
そうしなければ、戦えなかったんだ。
……オレと同じように。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_003<tab>I wanted to hollow myself out...and fill up that hole with hate. Forget who I was. And irony of ironies, that's just what the poor bastard tried to do to himself a century ago, too, isn't it?
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_003そう気づいた瞬間、ブランデンへの憎悪が薄れていくのを感じた。
無理やり造り上げた復讐心が半減すると、心に迷いが生まれた。
オレは本当にミリンダの仇を討てるのかと……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_004<tab>Heh. “Hard men” making hard choices... What rot.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_004<tab>オレは……オレは…………。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_Q1_000_000<tab>何と声をかける？

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_A1_000_001<tab>Hold on to Milinda and the memories you shared. Let that love guide you.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_A1_000_001<tab>ミリンダのために剣を取れ！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_A1_000_002<tab>Think not of Dikaiosyne, but Branden. Grant him peace and you will find your own.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_A1_000_002<tab>ブランデンのために剣を取れ！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_006<tab>...You're right. I don't need the hate. Never did. I'll finish it for Milinda...and for Branden. And then...I'll move on.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_006ミリンダのため……？
いや、それだけで倒せる相手じゃない……。
ならば……オレはブランデンのためにもディカイオシュネーを討つ！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_007<tab>...Maybe. Still, that thing's no more than a mindless eater. Nothing it can say or do to make it right. So I'll finish the hunt...for Milinda...and for Branden. And then...I'll move on.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_007そうだな……そうすべきだ……。
オレはディカイオシュネーを討つ……。
ミリンダのために、そして……ブランデンのためにな！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_SULOUL_000_008<tab>Ah, sorry. Having planted my head so far up my own arse, it's taking me time to remove it. Don't worry, I'll finish the hunt with you─but for the right reasons. For Milinda...and for Branden. And then...I'll move on.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_SULOUL_000_008道は、オレ自身が決めなくちゃならないってことだな？
なら、オレはディカイオシュネーを討つ……。
ミリンダのために、そして……ブランデンのためにな！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_SULOUL_000_009<tab>...Move on, you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_SULOUL_000_009<tab>ブランデンのためじゃと？

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_010<tab>I can't live off hate. Shouldn't've made it this far, frankly. And the more I try to reach for it, the more I find...sorrow? Pity?
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_010憎悪だけが力の根源たり得るわけじゃない。
同じ絶望を味わったあいつの無念を、オレが代わりに晴らす……。
そんな決意も、オレの剣に鋭さを与えてくれる気がしてな。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_SULOUL_000_011<tab>Curse not fate, but mourn her victims. Remember the dead as they lived.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_SULOUL_000_011ディカイオシュネーへの復讐も、
ブランデンの救済も、どちらも果たそうと言うのか……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_012<tab>Aye, something like that. Reckon <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> would agree. And Milinda, if she were here, would probably slap me a dozen times and call me a bloody fool for acting the way I have.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_012相棒が、背中を押してくれたからな。
それにミリンダが生きていたら、
きっとそうしろと言ってくれたと思うんだ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_013<tab>Or maybe you've been thinking about doing that in her stead, eh?
target: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_013<tab>そうだろ、相棒？

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_014<tab>Apologies for treating you with such disrespect before, Sul Oul. I'd like to claim I finally understand what you've been trying to tell me all this time, but I'm still getting my head around it─
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_014待たせて悪かったな！
さあ、今度こそあの野郎との決着といこうぜ！
スール＝オール、「双頭狼の爪」の在処を教えてくれ！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_SULOUL_000_015<tab>Recognizing your faults is the first and most important step. I will tell you what I know of the Claws of Orthus.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_SULOUL_000_015<tab>待て、その前にワシが知る限りの情報を話しておこう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_SULOUL_000_016<tab>The ring, together with the bracelet and choker were three relics passed down through the royal family over generations, signifying the owner's right to rule.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_SULOUL_000_016まず、フッブート王国の三国宝は、
次期王位継承者に受け継がれる装飾品のことでな。
最後の持ち主は、第一王女であるソールディア姫じゃった。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_SULOUL_000_017<tab>Princess Sauldia was the last of her line, and after her death, they were stored in a sanctuary for safekeeping. However, a year ago, a band of thieves learned of its existence...
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_SULOUL_000_017これらの品々は、姫の死後、
フッブート王国の宝物殿に納められておったが、
一年ほど前に侵入者が、そのうちふたつを持ち出したのじゃ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_018<tab>The ones who stole the Fangs and Eyes of Orthus?
target: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_018<tab>「双頭狼の牙」と「双頭狼の眼」のことだな？

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_SULOUL_000_019<tab>Yes. The relics were concealed with magical wards. I can only presume that once they were spirited away, Dikaiosyne was then able to sense their presence.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_SULOUL_000_019うむ……宝物殿は結界によって護られておったが、
その外に持ち出されたことで、ふたつの国宝は、
ディカイオシュネーの感知に引っかかったのじゃろう……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_020<tab>Even in death, a slave to duty, you said? You think he pursued the thieves out of an instinctive loyalty to his princess?
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_020忠誠を誓ったソールディア姫ゆかりの品が、
近くにあると気づき、無意識に奪還を試みたってわけか。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_SULOUL_000_021<tab>That I do. After all, he was content to leave them be so long as they remained hidden.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_SULOUL_000_021おそらくはな……。
ワシとて、ソールディア姫に仕えた身じゃ。
その遺品でもある三国宝を掘り起こされていい気はせん。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_022<tab>Only two of the three were taken? Then the third is still─
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_022なら、なおさらディカイオシュネーからも、
「双頭狼の牙」と「双頭狼の眼」を取り戻すべきじゃないのか？
そのためにも……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_SULOUL_000_023<tab>Claim the Claws of Orthus and he will surely come for you, yes.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_SULOUL_000_023わかっておる。
ゆえに、おぬしらに「双頭狼の爪」の在処を教えよう。
ディカイオシュネーをおびき出し、引導を渡してやってくれ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_SULOUL_000_024<tab>Timh Gyeus is where you must go. Once you arrive at the place I marked on your map, cast this powder into the air. The glamour will fade, and you will see the chest with the ring. The rest is up to you.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_SULOUL_000_024ティム・グースのあたりまで行ったら、
その「」を振りかけるのじゃ。
さすれば不可視の魔法が解け、「双頭狼の爪」が姿を現すじゃろう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_025<tab>Thank you, Sul Oul. I promise we will bring your friend peace.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_025安心しな、爺さん。
ブランデンの肉体は、オレたちが必ず奪い返してやるさ。
ディカイオシュネーの野郎を倒すことでな。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_026<tab>With me, sinner!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_026<tab>そうと決まれば行こうぜ、相棒！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_SULOUL_000_027<tab>And may you find peace as well, child...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_SULOUL_000_027<tab>頼むぞ……グランソン、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_030<tab>...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_030<tab>…………。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_SYSTEM_000_050<tab>You toss the powder into the air, and as it slowly settles to the earth as twinkling motes of light, a coffer begins to take shape...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_SYSTEM_000_050<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8E8901 /var>に反応して、不可視の魔法が解除された！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_051<tab>This must be the Claws of Orthus.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_051<tab>こいつが「双頭狼の爪」か……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_100_051<tab>All that's left is to decide when and where we want to confront the eater...
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_100_051さて、あとはどうやってあの野郎を誘い出すか……
一度戻って、爺さんに相談してみるか。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_052<tab>Or we could deal with it here and now. Speak of the devil and he shall appear...
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_052……早速、嗅ぎつけてきやがったか。
話が早くて助かるぜ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_053<tab>Hey there, old man. I don't know you, and you don't know me...but I know your story. I know this isn't you. And I know that if Lady Sauldia was here, she'd say the same thing...
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_053罪喰いに体を乗っ取られてもなお、主のために剣を振るうとはね。
その忠誠心、ひとりの男として尊敬に値する……が、
お前のお姫さんは、そんなことを望んでないんじゃないか？

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_054<tab>It'll all be over soon. I promise you...
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_054行くぞ、)) (( )) 02 /var>！
ブランデンの誇りを汚す、罪喰い野郎を叩き斬るんだ！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_SULOUL_000_60<tab>Go to the place I marked on your map, and there use the powder in the satchel to dispel the glamour concealing the coffer. You will find the ring within.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_SULOUL_000_60ティム・グースのあたりまで行ったら、
その「」を振りかけるのじゃ。
さすれば不可視の魔法が解け、「双頭狼の爪」が姿を現すじゃろう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_QIB_001_TODO_1<tab>Defeat Dikaiosyne!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_QIB_001_TODO_1<tab>ディカイオシュネーを倒せ！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_BATTLETALK_000_010<tab>Come! Let's put the poor bastard out of his misery!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_BATTLETALK_000_010さあ、行こうぜ！
あの野郎をぶっ倒して、すべてを終わらせるぞ！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_BATTLETALK_000_020<tab>What the─ Did he do that!?
target: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_BATTLETALK_000_020<tab>おいおい、いったい何が始まるんだ？

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_BATTLETALK_000_030<tab>Well that's hardly fair! Hold on, sinner!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_BATTLETALK_000_030姑息な真似しやがって！
待っててくれ、相棒！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_BATTLETALK_000_040<tab>This is surprisingly complicated... Still with me?
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_BATTLETALK_000_040チッ……やはり、一筋縄でいく相手じゃねえな。
相棒、そっちは無事か？

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_BATTLETALK_000_050<tab>Something doesn't smell right. Stand back!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_BATTLETALK_000_050嫌な予感がするぜ……こっちはオレに任せてくれ！
相棒はもう一方を頼む！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_BATTLETALK_000_060<tab>Tough ol' bastard, isn't he? But I'm no slouch myself...
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_BATTLETALK_000_060さすがにやるな……
だが、ここで倒れるわけにはいかないんでね！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_BATTLETALK_000_070<tab>Oh, come on! Not again!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_BATTLETALK_000_070<tab>またか……しつこい野郎は嫌われるぜ！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_BATTLETALK_000_080<tab>Looks like it's my turn. I'm counting on you, sinner!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_BATTLETALK_000_080今度はオレの番ってわけかい……
相棒、悪いが頼んだぜ！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_BATTLETALK_000_090<tab>Wicked white, I felt that one. Thanks!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_BATTLETALK_000_090<tab>ふぅ～、助かった……やっぱ頼りになるぜ、アンタ！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_BATTLETALK_000_100<tab>I'm sorry, Milinda. I tried...
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_BATTLETALK_000_100こんな所で死んでたまるか……
オレは……ミリンダの……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_055<tab><pant> <pant> Damn eater...let him go! He's not your bloody puppet!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_055ハァ……ハァ……ハァ……
とっとと消えやがれ、罪喰い野郎……！
その身体は、お前が使っていいもんじゃねぇ！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_056<tab>Heh, finally... You watching, Milinda?
target: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_056<tab>終わったぜ、ミリンダ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_BRANDEN_000_057<tab>(-Branden's Shade-)Now...and ever after, my lady Sauldia... My sword is yours...to command...
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_BRANDEN_000_057(-ブランデンの幻影-)ソールディア……。
剣となり、あなたを守ると誓ったのに……。
オレは……果たせなかった……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_058<tab>Branden? He's still in there?
target: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_058<tab>こいつは……ブランデン……？

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_BRANDEN_000_059<tab>(-Branden's Shade-)I'll not hesitate again. No matter the cost─no matter the sacrifice...
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_BRANDEN_000_059(-ブランデンの幻影-)オレは……もう二度と畏れたりはしない……。
どんな犠牲を払ってでも、オレの正義を成してみせる……。
それが、ソールディアへの手向けだ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_060<tab>...Wait. Is he trapped in the memory still?
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_060いや……ブランデンの記憶の残滓か……。
それが、肉体から解き放たれたとでもいうのか……？

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_061<tab>You're wrong, Branden! That's not what she would want! Let go of your anger! Let go of her!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_061おい、ブランデン！
彼女の最期の言葉を呪いに変えて、己を責めるのはやめろ！
そんなこと、ソールディア姫は望んじゃいないはずだ！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_BRANDEN_000_062<tab>(-Branden's Shade-)...But that would make me lesser in your eyes, wouldn't it? To shoulder a burden that need not be mine. No. I will not forsake compassion and love. I will not dishonor your memory.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_BRANDEN_000_062(-ブランデンの幻影-)フッ……こんなオレを、きっとあなたは叱るだろうな。
だから……もしもまた巡り会えた時は……
今度こそ、あなたが信じたオレで在りたい……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_BRANDEN_000_063<tab>(-Branden's Shade-)Oh, my lady Sauldia...
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_BRANDEN_000_063(-ブランデンの幻影-)ありがとう、ソールディア……。
あなたと出会うことができて良かった……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_064<tab>...He's gone.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_064<tab>消えちまったな……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_065<tab>And with that, the three treasures of the royal family are reunited. Now we've just got to find a place to stick them so that no scavenger ever stumbles upon them again.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_065これで、ふたたび三国宝がそろったか……。
今度こそ、スカベンジャーどもに掘り起こされないよう、
厳重に保管してもらわなくちゃな。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_066<tab>Least we can do for the princess and her knight, am I right?
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_066ブランデンやソールディア姫には、
安らかに眠っていてもらいたいだろ？

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_067<tab>Maybe Sul Oul will have some ideas. Let's head back to Pla Enni.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_067それじゃ、プラ・エンニ茸窟に戻るとしようぜ。
「スール＝オール」の爺さんが首を長くして待っているはずさ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_070<tab>This should be the place. You've got the powder on you, right?
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_070スール＝オールの爺さんは、
このあたりで「」を使えって言ってたっけか？

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_SULOUL_000_100<tab>It is done? Branden has been laid to rest?
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_SULOUL_000_100戻ったか……！
して、ブランデンは、ディカイオシュネーはどうなった！？

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_101<tab>You saw us when we arrived. Do you really have to ask?
target: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_101<tab>おいおい爺さん、オレたちの顔を見たらわかるだろ？

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_SULOUL_000_102<tab>No, I suppose not. Oh, my dear friend...I pray you have found peace.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_SULOUL_000_102そうか、そうか……。
良かったのう、ブランデン……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_SULOUL_000_103<tab>And what of you, Granson? Has the turmoil in your heart subsided at last?
target: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_SULOUL_000_103<tab>おぬしも、ようやく悲願の仇討ちを成すことができたのじゃな。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_104<tab>Aye, I suppose so...though, to be honest, it felt like I made my peace with him before we even fought...
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_104そうだな……思えば、オレはこれまで、
ディカイオシュネーを殺すことだけを考えて生きてきた。
これからは何のために生きていけばいいんだろうな……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_SULOUL_000_105<tab>Because you finally saw him for what he was, and accepted that truth into your heart. The battle was but an afterthought.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_SULOUL_000_105<tab>生きる意味など、生きていればいくらでも見つかるものじゃ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_106<tab>Hah! Easy for you to say. You didn't have to cross blades with the bloke.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_106<tab>ハハッ、さすが長生きしてる爺さんは言うことが違うねえ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_107<tab>By the way─I've brought you some gifts.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_107ところで、爺さんよ。
こいつを預かってくれないか？

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_SULOUL_000_108<tab>The three royal relics of Voeburt! Then Branden was safeguarding both the bracelet and the choker...
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_SULOUL_000_108これは……フッブート王国の三国宝……！
そうか、ディカイオシュネーから回収できたのじゃな？

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_109<tab>And now it's your turn to look after the whole lot. That's what Lady Sauldia and her knight would've wanted, I reckon.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_109そいつはアンタが持っててくれ。
あのふたりも、それを望んでいるはずさ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_SULOUL_000_110<tab>Yes, of course... That their souls may sleep soundly forevermore, we shall enshrine these relics for all eternity...
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_SULOUL_000_110……承った。
ブランデンとソールディア姫が安らかに眠れるよう、
未来永劫、この地で守っていこう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_111<tab>Now that that's settled, I suppose we should be on our way. There's a detour I'll have to take, but afterwards I'd like to speak with you back at the usual spot in the Crystarium.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_111さて、当初の目的だったディカイオシュネーの討伐も済んだことだ、
酒場のマスターに報告がてら、挨拶しておかないとな。
オレは「彷徨う階段亭」に戻るぜ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_112<tab>Be well, Sul Oul.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_112<tab>爺さん、元気でな。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_SULOUL_000_113<tab>I think that one has a bright life ahead of him. Few can find the strength to overcome such terrible tragedy, but he did.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_SULOUL_000_113あやつが多幸な人生を歩むことを願うばかりじゃ。
これまで受けた悲しみを上回るほどのな……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_SULOUL_000_114<tab>As have you, on no few occasions, I am sure.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_SULOUL_000_114<tab>無論、おぬしもな。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_SULOUL_000_115<tab>It has been a pleasure, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Do visit me should you ever yearn to hear an old fool prattle on and on.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_SULOUL_000_115ワシはいつでもここにいる。
無駄に長生きしている老いぼれの話が聞きたくなった時は、
いつでも訪ねるがよい。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_120<tab>After you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_120<tab>さあ、「スール＝オール」の爺さんに報告しようぜ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_150<tab>Well met, sinner. Glad to see you made it back safe and sound.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_150よう、相棒。
マスターへの挨拶なら、もう済ませたぜ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_151<tab>Having returned to where it all began, I can't help but think back to when I first came here, thinking only of Dikaiosyne and my revenge. I was so wrapped up in my own personal affairs that I didn't realize I was only pushing others away...
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_151思えば、ここに来たばかりの頃のオレは、
復讐のことばかり考えていて、周りの連中と衝突することもあった。
そんな時、グリナードが助け舟を出してくれてな。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_152<tab>Glynard was the only one who saw through the facade. He's a perceptive one, aye─took one look at me when I got back and broke into a smile.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_152その時の礼も含めて、感謝の言葉を伝えておいたよ。
憑き物が落ちたようなオレの顔を見て、彼は笑っていたがな。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_153<tab>But enough about him─I have yet to thank you properly, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I owe you so much for sticking with me to the end...
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_153さて、心残りも片付けたことだし、オレは失礼させてもらうぜ。
アンタにも世話になったな、相棒。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_Q2_000_000<tab>何と声をかける？

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_A2_000_001<tab>So what's next for you, sinner?
target: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_A2_000_001<tab>どこへ行く？

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_155<tab>Good question. Can't say I feel at home here or in Wright or anywhere else, so I might spend some time on the road. I may not be as skilled a fighter as you, but I reckon I'm better than most, and there's always someone in need of a reliable sword hand.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_155さあねえ、今さらオレの居場所なんてどこにもないだろうからな。
だが、オレの力を必要としている連中はいるかもしれない……。
そいつらのために戦い続けるのも、悪くはない。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_156<tab>What? At a loss for words? <var 1A 02 /var>You<var 1A 01 /var>? Or are you getting misty-eyed at the thought of us parting ways? I'll still be around, you know.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_156そんな顔をするなよ。
また会うことくらいあるだろうさ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_157<tab>Not here, though. Can't say I feel at home in the Crystarium or in Wright or anywhere else, so I might spend some time on the road. I may not be as skilled a fighter as you, but I reckon I'm better than most, and there's always someone in need of a reliable sword hand.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_157とは言え、今さらオレの居場所なんてどこにもないだろうがな。
だが、オレの力を必要としている連中はいるかもしれない……。
そいつらのために戦い続けるのも、悪くはない。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_158<tab>Milinda would want me to use my talents for a noble purpose, and helping folks in need fits the bill. Hells, isn't that what Branden and his comrades wound up doing in the end?
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_158ミリンダが生きていたら、そうしろと言っただろうしな。
それに……ブランデンが生きていたら、そうしただろうさ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_159<tab>So─let's not call it a good-bye. Let's just say...until the next hunt.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_159それじゃ、ひとまずはお別れだ！
あばよ、相棒！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_160<tab>Wheresoever you go, may you find shade, sinner.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_GRANSON_000_160アンタと旅したことは忘れないぜ！
オレが生きている限りな！

source: TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_SULOUL_000_165<tab>...Oh? You wish to listen to my ramblings now? Nay, I think not. Another time, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, another time.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA151_03248_SULOUL_000_165ワシはいつでもここにいる。
無駄に長生きしている老いぼれの話が聞きたくなった時は、
いつでも訪ねるがよい。
